news: [Roadmap] Bruteforce Database Table Column, Full Path Disclosure, Program self-updater, User Agent configuration, Injection strategies: DIOS / Routed query / Out of band / Update Insert Delete, WAF detection, Bruteforce of HTTP Auth using NTLM, Arabic translation, Command line interface.
[Done] Database flavor: Neo4j NuoDB Hana and Vertica, Russian complete translation.
[New v0.79] Error Strategies for MySQL and PostgreSQL compatible with Order/Group By, Wider range of Characters Insertion including multibyte %bf.

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
[Programming] Contact the developer for any help with new features, CTF events and Burp integration.
